description:
Ayumu has been issued yet another challenge by the Blade Children. A challenge that could most definitely be Ayumu`s greatest and deadliest one yet. Meanwhile at the police station Madoka tries to get in to Kiyotaka`s file but instead learns that there`s a chance that Adachi, Sonobe, and Imazato possibly have something to do with Kiyotaka`s mysterious disappearance. Who were these three really and can Ayumu and Hiyono actually defeat the Blade Children once and for all?
Source: theTVDB.com
